alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 653 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over White Hall, or 11 miles east of Yemassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Beaufort, Yemassee, Hendersonville, Green Pond, Dale, Gardens Corner, Ashepoo and Ritter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
